system.description:
A magical gem which has the power to increase the value of other gems.

  • Usage: The gem must be placed with one or more other (non-magical) gems.

  • Effect: There is a [[/r 1d100]]{20%} chance of each of the other gems being magically polished, faceted, or otherwise perfected in form. Affected gems increase in value by 50%.

  • Charges: The gem has [[/r 10d10]] charges. One charge is used each time it transforms another gem.

  • Facets: The gem has as many facets as it has charges. Each time a charge is spent, it loses one facet. When all charges have been spent, it becomes a worthless stone sphere.
